text: 21.36: Mt 24.42; Mk 13.33; Ru 18.1; Ef 6.13; VB 6.17Nde maaŋ muuŋgip, nde zazera tuituigira wari ganɨv kɨri. Nde kɨv zazera Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨv suaŋrim, anan ŋkasŋkar nden nɨɨŋrim, nde kɨri. Nde maaŋ muunga, ana ŋkasŋkar nden nɨɨŋrim, nde kha hɨrga bigi, nta nden hɨrim, nde Fhe Bakɨme Guma Guara nɨman thivgiv havhargirga.”
